jobDetails.description: Sailing across the Grand Line in search of the One Piece. Job includes battling Marines, eating questionable food, and occasionally yelling 'Iâ€™m gonna be King of the Pirates!'
jobDetails.note: Warning: Devil Fruit users may lose swimming privileges. Apply only if you have the heart of a dreamer and the appetite of Luffy.

vacancies.name: Future Pirate King
vacancies.description: Join a fearless crew of misfits on a wild adventure across the seas. Duties include treasure hunting, epic battles, and eating way too much meat. Glory, danger, and a massive bounty guaranteed!
